Name: maximize_story_points_in_sprint
Description: Maximize the total number of story points completed in a sprint to deliver maximum value.

Name: minimize_effort_for_blockers
Description: Minimize the man-hours spent on resolving blockers to improve team focus.

Name: maximize_feature_priority_in_release
Description: Maximize the cumulative priority of all features included in the next release plan.

Name: minimize_budget_overrun
Description: Minimize the difference between the planned project budget and the actual costs.

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average story points a team can complete per sprint.

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Minimize the total effort (in hours) for all tasks within a sprint backlog.

Name: maximize_achievement_of_sprint_goal
Description: Maximize the likelihood of achieving the sprint goal, represented as a status.

Name: minimize_number_of_open_blockers
Description: Minimize the count of blockers that do not have the status 'resolved'.

Name: maximize_stakeholder_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the value delivered to key stakeholders by focusing on features relevant to them.

Name: maximize_skill_level_in_team
Description: Maximize the sum of skill levels for all workers assigned to a specific team.

Name: minimize_sprint_planning_duration
Description: Minimize the time spent in the sprint planning meeting to make it more efficient.

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction_in_retrospective
Description: Maximize the team satisfaction score captured during the sprint retrospective.
